description:
Take control of your health – smarter, simpler, and more personal.

Vitaria helps you understand your body better with intelligent insights, AI Doctor Advice, and seamless HealthKit integration — all built with SwiftUI for a modern, smooth experience.

No more messy spreadsheets or disconnected trackers. Every health detail — from blood pressure to hydration — now lives in one secure, easy-to-use space designed with care.

What makes Vitaria different
- AI Doctor Advice – Receive personalized health insights powered by AI to better understand your daily trends and habits.
- HealthKit Integration – Sync your data automatically with Apple Health for a seamless experience across your devices.
- SwiftUI Experience – Enjoy a beautifully designed, fast, and accessible app built natively for iOS.
- Smart & Unified Tracking – Log blood pressure, blood sugar, heart rate, water intake, and medications — all in one app.
- Intelligent Insights – Visual trends, charts, and AI summaries help you see the bigger picture of your health journey.
- Reminders & Notes – Stay consistent with medication and hydration reminders, plus space for personal notes and observations.

Why users love Vitaria
- Simple, clean design that makes health tracking effortless.
- Secure storage — your health data always belongs to you.
- Developed independently, with no third-party templates or clones.
- Regular updates with new insights and features for your well-being.

Privacy & Responsibility

Vitaria is designed as a wellness companion, not a medical device.
It does not diagnose or treat medical conditions.
For any health concerns, always consult your healthcare professional.

Your data stays private — stored securely on your device and synced safely via HealthKit when enabled.
We never share personal information without your consent.

Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/vitaria-healthcare/privacy-policy

Build better habits with Vitaria – your health, your data, your insight.

Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.

Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.

With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.

With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts

New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.

Start tracking your cycle for free today.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy  
https://flo.health/terms-of-use 

Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.

Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.

If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.

Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.

Momiary: Pregnancy Tracker & Health Guide for Moms-to-Be
Take charge of your pregnancy journey with Momiary — a comprehensive app designed to support expecting moms with smart tracking tools, health insights, and expert-backed advice for every week of your pregnancy.

Whether you're planning, expecting, or already navigating symptoms, Momiary is your private, powerful companion.

Top Features of Momiary: Pregnancy & Period Tracker

1. Period & Ovulation Tracking

Stay in tune with your cycle: track periods, predict ovulation, and identify your fertile days.
View cycle patterns and get reminders tailored to hormonal changes.
Built-in ovulation calculator for accurate fertility prediction.
2. Pregnancy Health Monitoring

Log daily weight and symptoms like nausea, fatigue, or cravings.
Visualize your health trends with charts and analytics.
Receive daily advice based on your pregnancy stage and symptoms.
3. Week-by-Week Pregnancy Guide

Know what’s happening each week with a breakdown of baby’s development.
Fun comparisons like “baby’s size as a fruit” to track growth.
Countdown to your due date and access regular check-up tips.
4. Maternal Wellness & Lifestyle Tools

Get curated nutrition tips and mental wellness guidance.
Kegel exercise reminders to support pelvic health.
Browse name ideas and prepare for baby without stress.
Why Moms Love Momiary

Privacy-First Design: Your data stays on your device. No tracking, no third-party access.
Medical-Grade Content: Built on trusted health recommendations for moms and moms-to-be.
User-Focused: No overwhelming baby features – just smart tools for your well-being.
From irregular cycles to postpartum prep, Momiary helps you stay informed, healthy, and confident every step of the way.

Our Commitment to Data Privacy

Momiary does not collect or store your personal health data. Everything stays on your phone. Your journey, your data — always private.

Download Momiary Today
Start your pregnancy journey with support, clarity, and confidence. All-in-one care, made just for you.

Privacy URL: https://chuongmatrix.netlify.app/privacy.html
Term of Use: https://chuongmatrix.netlify.app/eula

My Calendar – Period Tracker by Simple Innovation is an elegant and easy-to-use period tracker that helps you take control of the many aspects of your menstrual cycle — from ovulation, fertility and periods, to birth control pills, moods and other symptoms.

Whether you are concerned about conceiving, birth control and contraception, or regularity of period cycles, Period Calendar can help. Our tracker is easy to use and offers everything you need: Track irregular periods, weight, temperature, moods, blood flow, symptoms and more.

Be PREPARED for your PERIOD:
- MAKE PLANS for rest and work
- Be CONFIDENT about your HEALTH. Add information to the app, use it to answer your doctor’s questions.
- Note SYMPTOMS, get insights. Use the charts to track changes.
- Track OVULATION and FERTILITY dates. 
- Keep your data SECRET. Use pin-code, face-ID or a fingerprint to keep the data safe.
- Take PILLS on time. Use reminders so you don't miss your pill time.

Discreet reminders keep you informed and prepared by predicting upcoming periods, ovulation, and fertile days. The app adapts to your cycle history and the calculator accurately predicts the important events during your cycle.

Key features:
- Vital info at a glance: intuitive calendar home page lets you visualize non-fertile, fertile, ovulation, expected period and actual period
- Entire cycle log and settings can be backed up and restored easily and quickly. Never be afraid to lose your calendar data, even when you lost your phone or get a new one.
- Detailed tracking: daily planner lets you save essential period information like flow, intercourse, symptoms, moods, temperature, weight, medicine, PMS, other cervical observations, and general diary notes
- Always stay in the loop with notifications for upcoming period, fertility windows or ovulation
- Protect your most private data from curious eyes: password lock it using a unique PIN code
- Personalize and make it yours: Gorgeous new watercolor themes, adjust period prediction intervals, luteal phase length, plus choose your units of measure and the first day of the week (Sunday or Monday) – all in Settings
- Abstinence mode hides ovulation, fertility and intercourse related data—perfect tracker for girls and teens just starting their periods
- Want to start fresh? Just reset it

You can track changes and symptoms during perimenopause, such as hot flashes, night sweats, mood swings, and irregular cycles.
Stay in control of your health with personalized insights and reminders tailored for this important life stage.
Whether you are starting to notice irregularities or want extra support, Perimenopause Mode helps you better understand your body and feel prepared every day.

This highly customizable period tracker and pregnancy planning calendar is perfect for any woman to take control of her health and keep organized.

Download it for FREE today!

description:
Connectez-vous à votre compte avec votre numéro de sécurité sociale, votre mot de passe et le code unique reçu par email ou via l'authentification biométrique (disponible sur smartphone) et accéder à tous les services suivants :

Consultez vos remboursements de soins :
    - Visualisez tous vos remboursements en détails

Consultez tous vos documents :    
    - Téléchargez votre attestation de droits ou d’indemnités journalières
    - Téléchargez vos relevés mensuels de remboursements, disponibles pour les 27 derniers mois

Réalisez certaines démarches sans vous déplacer :
    - Simulez et estimez vos indemnités journalières, et effectuez vos éventuelles démarches
    - Commandez votre carte européenne d’assurance maladie (CEAM) et visualisez-la sur votre smartphone
    - Déclarez la perte ou le vol de votre carte Vitale
    - Commandez une carte Vitale 
    - Déclarez votre nouveau-né à votre caisse 
    - Inscrivez votre enfant sur les cartes des deux parents
    - Modifiez votre nom d’usage
    - Déclarez un accident causé par un tiers
    - Accédez à la simulation de vos droits aux aides sociales
    - Consultez les délais de traitement de votre caisse
    - Choisissez votre organisme complémentaire en cas de chevauchement de contrats
    - Déclarez un acte médical ou un soin non réalisé

Gérez vos informations personnelles :
    - Retrouvez toutes vos informations personnelles
    - Modifiez votre adresse postale, votre adresse email et vos numéros de téléphone

Prenez rendez-vous avec votre caisse :
    - Choisissez un créneau de rendez-vous téléphonique
    - Modifiez vos rendez-vous
    - Supprimez vos rendez-vous
    - Visionnez vos rendez-vous à venir

【VitalTide APP: Your Portable Health Data Manager, Making Health Management Easier】
In the fast-paced modern life, health management is often "squeezed out" by busyness—you can’t find paper and pen when you want to record your blood pressure, lack systematic data when you want to analyze blood glucose changes, and have no way to integrate multiple health indicators. To help you break through these troubles, VitalTide APP comes into being. It integrates the recording of multi-dimensional health indicators such as blood pressure, blood glucose and heart rate, and serves as your reliable health partner that you can rely on at any time with simple operations and clear data presentation.
Core Features: Comprehensive Coverage to Make Health Data "Traceable"
1. Accurate Recording: Every Measurement Has a Clear Record
● Blood Pressure Recording: Adapted to Daily Monitoring Scenarios  
Whether it is the basic blood pressure measurement after getting up in the morning, or irregular monitoring during work breaks, after exercise, etc., the APP has a convenient recording entrance. You can quickly save the data by manually entering the measured values, no complicated operations are required, and it is easy to track the fluctuation trend of blood pressure.
● Blood Glucose Recording: Distinguish Scenarios to Facilitate Diet Analysis  
For blood glucose management needs, an intuitive and easy-to-use dedicated interface is designed: it supports distinguishing between "pre-meal" and "post-meal" records to help you clearly sort out the correlation between diet and blood glucose changes.
2. Multi-Dimensional Coverage: Meet the Needs of Comprehensive Health Management
In addition to blood pressure and blood glucose, the APP also supports the recording of basic indicators such as heart rate, height and weight, and is also equipped with reference for healthy diet guidelines—from basic physiological data to daily diet suggestions, it covers your health management needs in one stop, eliminating the need to switch between multiple tools.
Disclaimer
VitalTide APP is only used as a tool for recording and organizing health data. It cannot replace medical equipment nor provide medical diagnosis or treatment advice. If you have any health discomfort, need to obtain professional medical opinions or make medical decisions, please be sure to consult a practicing doctor to ensure your health and safety.

L'appli carte Vitale est votre carte Vitale sur smartphone : un service numérique de l’assurance maladie téléchargeable gratuitement.

Elle ne remplace pas votre carte Vitale mais constitue une alternative.

POUR ACTIVER VOTRE APPLI CARTE VITALE, VOUS DEVEZ VERIFIER LES CONDITIONS SUIVANTES :
- Avoir 16 ou 18 ans suivant votre régime d’affiliation,
- Disposer d’une pièce d’identité autorisée, 
- Disposer d’un smartphone compatible.

Retrouvez toutes les conditions pour pouvoir bénéficier de l’appli carte Vitale sur www.applicartevitale.fr

UNE FOIS ACTIVEE, VOTRE APPLI CARTE VITALE PERMET : 
- de s’identifier, comme avec sa carte Vitale chez votre pharmacien, votre médecin, votre chirurgien-dentiste, votre infirmier, votre opticien…,
- de visualiser vos dépenses de soins réalisées avec votre appli carte Vitale,
- d'accéder à vos informations et à celles de vos bénéficiaires : numéro de Sécurité sociale, organisme obligatoire de rattachement, mais aussi d’autres informations telles que l’Identité Nationale de Santé.

L’équipement des professionnels de santé se fait progressivement.
Il est donc conseillé de toujours garder sa carte Vitale sur soi.

Pour connaître les professionnels de santé qui acceptent l’application, vous pouvez consulter l’annuaire santé disponible sur le site Ameli https://annuairesante.ameli.fr
Un affichage est présent chez les professionnels de santé équipés. N'hésitez pas à leur présenter votre appli carte Vitale. 

SECURITE ET RESPECT DE VOS DONNEES
- L’appli carte Vitale est développée de manière à garantir l’intégrité, la disponibilité et la confidentialité des données. Les traitements respectent le RGPD.
- Les données d’identification sont stockées uniquement dans le smartphone. Il est possible de les effacer à tout moment.
- L’appli carte Vitale est accessible avec une double sécurisation : un mot de passe de déverrouillage de votre appli carte Vitale qui vient s’ajouter au mot de passe de déverrouillage du smartphone.

L’application carte Vitale est développée par le GIE SESAM Vitale, qui est missionné par l’assurance maladie à la demande du ministère des Solidarités et de la Santé.
Plus d’infos sur www.applicartevitale.fr

Focus, relax, and sleep through the power of sound. Endel creates AI-powered sounds designed to support your everyday life. Backed by science, and enjoyed by millions worldwide.

Endel is powered by its patented core AI technology. It takes inputs like location, environment, and heart rate, to create the optimal personalized soundscape. This happens on the fly and allows Endel to reconnect your state with your circadian rhythm.

Get access to the following classic soundscapes at home, work, or on the move to relax, concentrate, and minimize distractions and brain fatigue:


• Focus – boosts your productivity by helping you concentrate for longer

• Sleep – soothes you into a deep sleep with soft, gentle sounds

• Relax – calms your mind to create feelings of comfort and safety

• Move – feel grounded and present while walking, hiking, or running


ENDEL PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION


Alongside the classics, the Premium package contains the following Endel Soundscapes and features:

• Colored Noise – choose one of 9 colors of noise to focus, relax, sleep, and mask outside sound

• Study – improves concentration and keeps you calm while studying or working

• Dynamic Focus – get your perfect productivity support with real-time sound tuning

• Hibernation – nourish your ears with cozy sounds for cold-season slumber

• Nature Elements – nurture the mind with sounds of nature, your way

• Rainy Outside – cozy up to the gentle patter of rain, blended with sleep-aiding sounds

• Recovery – revives your wellbeing with sounds engineered to lower anxiety

• Spatial Orbit – venture into a more peaceful dimension with an immersive Spatial Audio experience

• Focus Timer – the famous interval work method, upgraded with science-backed Focus sounds


On top of the much-loved original Endel soundscapes, Endel works with innovative artists and thinkers to create unique experiences. These collaborative Endel Soundscapes are available for Premium users:


• James Blake: Wind Down – prepare your body for sleep with soothing sounds from an award-winning artist

• Grimes: AI Lullaby – supports sleep for babies and adults with original sounds and vocals from Grimes

• Plastikman: Deeper Focus – a deep focus techno soundscape created with Richie Hawtin

• Alan Watts: Wiggly Wisdom – soothing and motivation spoken word soundscape, infused with the playful wisdom from Alan Watts

• Miguel: Clarity Trip – elevate your every step with original sounds from Miguel

Endel Pacific is the patented technology that powers our apps and integrations. 

All soundscapes are available offline.

Apart from the Premium sounds and features, Endel Premium users get access to the exclusive Apple Podcast shows.


SUBSCRIPTION TERMS


Skip the payment screen by tapping “X” in the top-right corner of the offer. The Free Edition of Endel will start automatically.

You can get access to Endel Premium by subscribing to a recurrent plan of your choice or with a one-time Lifetime purchase.

Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

Payment will be charged to your Apple account at confirmation of purchase.

Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be provided.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user. Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.

No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.

Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.


For more information:


Terms of Use - https://endel.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360003558200

Privacy Policy - https://endel.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/360003562619

Still waiting for next summer to train your legs and butt? Start right now to feel the positive changes in your body after a few weeks, be proud of yourself!

Proper form during exercises is the most important aspect of sculpting toned legs and a tight butt. Usually the exercises need to target three major muscle groups - butt, thighs and leg muscles.

Butt & Legs Workout offers you a new training method:  A 30-day systematic exercise plan - it's more effective but requires less equipment and has less fewer restrictions.

You can easily do it at home or anywhere at anytime, just 10 minutes each day. It’s more than just a private coach. It offers animations and video guidance for each exercise. By following our workout, you will notice a change in the shape of your butt and legs been in just a few short weeks.

Features
- On "Me" page, turn on the "Apple Health" switch to sync the information of your height, weight, calories to Apple Health
- No surprise and hidden charges
- Different workouts every day
- Increases exercise intensity step by step
- Coach tips in every exercise help you use the right form to get better results
- No need for equipment, workout with your body weight
- Track weight loss progress
- Calculate burned calories
- Animations and video guidance
- Workout reminders
- The exercises are suitable for everyone, both beginners and pros

Butt Workout, Buttocks Workout & Hips Workout

Looking for efficient butt workout? No suitable buttocks workout? Try our buttocks workout! We prepared different hips workout for you, and all of our hips workout is popular and professional. A beautiful butt is within your reach with our hips workout. Our butt workout is your best choice!

Subscription Terms and Details

- Subscription may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase.

- Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Embark on a revolutionary journey with MenstruMate, your ultimate companion for navigating the intricacies of your menstrual cycle. Seamlessly blending precision, insights, and empowerment, MenstruMate is designed to transform the way you approach your well-being.

- Predictions with CycleSync: Experience worry-free planning with MenstruMate's CycleSync feature, offering accurate predictions for your upcoming period and fertile days. Stay ahead of your cycle effortlessly, allowing you to confidently plan your life.

- Intuitive Insights with FlowTrack Charts: Visualize your hormonal patterns like never before! MenstruMate's FlowTrack charts provide intuitive insights into your menstrual cycle, empowering you with a deeper understanding of your body's unique rhythms.

- Holistic Approach with Color Guide & Period Info: Explore the Color Guide for a holistic understanding of your period. MenstruMate not only predicts but educates, offering facts, dispelling myths, and providing tips for a well-rounded menstrual well-being.

- Stress-Free Living with CycleEase: Experience stress-free living with MenstruMate's CycleEase feature. Receive cycle-specific tips on self-care and lifestyle adjustments, ensuring a harmonious and stress-free relationship with your cycle.

- Fertility Awareness with OvaCycle: Empower yourself with fertility awareness through MenstruMate's OvaCycle feature. Whether you're planning or preventing, stay informed about your fertile days, making confident decisions about your reproductive health.

- Efficient Time Management with TimeFlow: Take control of your time with MenstruMate's TimeFlow feature. Receive timely notifications and reminders tailored to your menstrual cycle, harmonizing your daily activities with your body's natural rhythm.

- Empowerment with RedRhythm: Celebrate your menstrual cycle as a source of empowerment with MenstruMate's RedRhythm feature. Beyond predictions, MenstruMate provides information that empowers you to embrace and understand your body.

- Health Insights with PeriodicPulse: Gain valuable health insights with MenstruMate's PeriodicPulse feature. The app not only predicts your cycle but also educates you on the health implications of your menstrual patterns, fostering a holistic approach to well-being.

- Seamless Integration with SyncCycle: Integrate MenstruMate seamlessly into your life with SyncCycle. Synchronize with your calendar and lifestyle for a hassle-free experience that adapts to your unique needs.


Embark on a journey of empowerment and self-awareness with MenstruMate. Make every cycle a confident and informed experience!


Disclaimer: MenstruMate provides cycle insights but is not a substitute for professional medical advice. Consult with a healthcare professional for personalized guidance. Your well-being matters!

Strengthen the muscles most men ignore. KegelUp provides guided pelvic floor training designed specifically for men's health. Private. Effective. Just 5 minutes a day.

Whether you're seeking better control, improved core strength, or enhanced awareness, KegelUp guides you through easy exercises with crystal-clear visuals and audio coaching. No equipment needed - follow along and feel the difference.

Our daily workouts take just 5 minutes but deliver real results. Start with basic routines that build your foundation, then progress to advanced workouts designed specifically for male pelvic health. Track your progress, earn achievements, and build a habit that lasts. See your improvement daily and stay motivated as you develop better control.

Privacy meets performance in every aspect of our design. Programmes are designed with feedback that keeps you on rhythm. Access articles on men's health, performance, energy, and recovery. Learn from others and know what works — and why.

Join thousands of men who've discovered that intentional training beats hoping for change.

Upgrade to premium and get access to all our features, ad-free use, and new updates. Choose from available subscription plans.

Your payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the time of purchase and will renew automatically unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscription through your account settings on the App Store after purchase.

WHAT'S INCLUDED:
KEGEL TRAINER -  kegel exercises with animated guidance and rhythm feedback
BASIC PROGRAMME - quick pelvic floor workouts you can follow anywhere, anytime
PRO WORKOUTS - video courses for men with structured training designed for male health
DAILY ROUTINE TRACKER - calendar-based progress tracking to build lasting habits and consistency monitoring
MAN INSIGHTS - various articles on performance, energy, and men's wellness

Health and Safety Disclaimer

KegelUp is designed for informational and educational purposes only. Whilst we provide exercise guidance based on established practices, the app is not a medical device and should not be used as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. The use of this app does not establish a doctor-patient or any other professional healthcare relationship. Consult with a healthcare provider before starting any new exercise programme. Stop using the app if you experience pain or discomfort. The App should not be used to diagnose or treat medical conditions. Results may vary based on individual circumstances and commitment to the programme.

Terms of Use: https://kegelup.pro/terms
Privacy Policy: https://kegelup.pro/privacy

If you have any ideas for improvement or experience any difficulties whilst using our app, please let us know at support@appolightapps.com

Whisperly turns restless nights into restful ones.
It’s your gentle, all-in-one companion for better sleep: use intelligent sleep track to understand how you slept, spot early warning signs that disturb your rest, and ease into the night with soothing sounds and guided meditation that help you relax.

What you get
• Intelligent sleep track – Capture time to fall asleep, total sleep, wake-ups, wake time, and more so you can see what really happened each night.
• Early pattern alerts – Get timely hints when your sleep rhythm shows potential issues (like frequent brief wake-ups or long sleep latency).
• Clear, visual reports – Readable nightly summaries plus weekly/monthly trends that highlight changes and point to possible next steps.
• Soothing sounds library – White noise, nature, ambient music, and gentle atmospheres. Mix your favorites, set a timer, and use fade in/out for a calm landing into sleep.
• Meditation & relax practices – Short breathing, body scan, and light guided sessions to lower arousal, calm the mind, and make drifting off easier.
• Bedtime ritual & reminders – Build a consistent pre-sleep routine and stabilize your body clock with friendly nudges.

Why Whisperly
 • From data to direction – Not just “how you slept,” but simple insights into why and what you can try next.
 • Low effort, high clarity – No complex setup. Open, use, and start learning from night one.
 • Designed for anyone who struggles with sleep – Trouble falling asleep, light sleep with frequent waking, early rising, jet lag recovery, or stress-driven fluctuations.

Friendly note
Whisperly supports healthy habits and better sleep awareness. It does not provide medical diagnosis or treatment. If you experience persistent or serious sleep concerns, please consult a healthcare professional.

Start tonight. Understand your sleep, feel the relax, and let Whisperly guide you back to deeper rest.

Payment & Subscription Terms:
Choose between the following subscription options for unlimited access to all features:
• Monthly Subscription
• Quarterly Subscription
• Yearly Subscription

	•	Payment: Charges apply to your iTunes Account at purchase conformation.
	•	Auto-Renewal: Subscriptions renew automatically unless canceled at least 24 hours before the current period ends.
	•	Renewal Charges: Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, based on the selected plan.
	•	Manage Your Subscription: Go to your Account Settings after purchase to handle auto-renewal and other preferences.

description:
Recommended by personal trainers, soldiers and Pilates instructors, COREwheels combines the best of ab rollers and pushup bars. Their unique rolling motion targets muscles from multiple angles and develops your core strength and stability better than other fitness products.

This Free app guides you through interactive workout experiences using only COREwheels. Roll your way to a lean and toned body with workouts custom-tailored to your fitness level and time available. 

Developed by the team at GAIN Fitness, makers of the top workout apps, COREwheels Workouts includes:

• CUSTOM WORKOUTS: multiple FREE workouts handcrafted by fitness experts. Just use the convenient filters to refine the workouts down to your desired duration, body parts, and fitness level.
• GAIN-GUIDED EXPERIENCE*: Our award winning workout experience coaches you through each exercise, rep, and rest with HD motion images, voice commands, and form cues spoken by real personal trainers.
• PROGRESS TRACKING: Track every set, rep, weight, and rest time. It’s so simple, you may not even notice it.

*Works well with or without headphones (recommended), an armband, a phone stand (recommended), and various workout equipment and phone handling scenarios. It also integrates seamlessly with your music player of choice.

** Top Rating Reproductive Health App ** 
 
Check out the most widely-used period, ovulation & pregnancy tracker, which has been helping to improve the well-being of over 300,000,000 women across 45+ countries in the past decade. 
 
We understand your concerns about your private data security, especially with the recent news.
Here's how we protect your data:
• You can use our app without creating an account.
• You remain COMPLETELY ANONYMOUS while using our app.
• You can DELETE ALL DATA in 1 click whenever you want.
 
At every stage of your life, we safeguard your well-being. 
 
PERIOD & CYCLE CALENDAR
We'll remind you of the dates when your next period starts and ends on time. It's useful whether you have irregular or regular menses. Better? You'll receive tailored PMS advice and instant menstrual pain relief guidance.
 
OVULATION & FERTILITY TRACKER
We help you calculate your most fertile days and analyze your fertility window based on your unique cycle. You can get pregnant naturally ASAP by learning your CHANCE OF CONCEPTION every day.
 
PREGNANCY MODE: WEEK-BY-WEEK 
Follow your baby's weekly growth. Use our due date calculator to find out when your baby's BIG DAY will be and count down it.
 
BIRTH CONTROL PLANNER
Quickly record and stay on track with your contraceptive methods like pills, rings, patches, injections, IUDs, or implants. You can customize the reminder message for individual services.
 
PILL REMINDER
Set start date, interval, durations, and dose quantity for any medication, drugs, or supplements. So you won't forget to take pills when life gets busy.
 
SYMPTOM PREDICTIONS & TIPS
Record your symptoms during any life stage. Get predictions and courses to learn how to deal with them. Take breast self-exam monthly to find abnormalities early.
 
>>Key Features:
- Accurate prediction & reminders of menstruation & the most fertile days 
- Track the cycle lengths, flow intensity, when you are ovulating, birth control methods, etc.
- Log 58 symptoms, 67 moods, and energy levels to know your menstrual pattern
- Track daily chance of getting pregnant with BBT, cervical mucus, ovulation & pregnancy test records
- Baby's due date countdown
- Baby's weekly growth tracker
- Export a health report with charts for self-archive or doctors
- Insights from fertility specialists
- PIN code, Face ID, & Fingerprint lock to protect your private data
- Daily health tracker: weight, hydration, sleep, mood, sex, steps, etc.
- Breast self-exam guidance
- Multiple accounts to track for different, for example, mother/daughter 
- Unlimited app themes & pets
- Available in 39 languages
- Sync data with Apple Health
- Backup and restore data between devices
 
Note: Period Calendar should not be used to replace any form of contraceptive method.

Track progress toward your nutrition, water, fitness, and weight loss goals with MyFitnessPal. This all-in-one food tracker and health app is like having a nutrition coach, meal planner, and food diary with you at all times.

MyFitnessPal isn’t another restrictive diet app. This is a health app to help you learn about your habits … see how you eat … make smarter food choices … find motivation & support ... and conquer your health goals.

Download and start your free 30-day Premium trial to access exclusive food tracking, fitness logging tools, and expert guidance. You’ll soon discover why MyFitnessPal is the #1 food and nutrition tracker in the U.S., a GQ 2020 Fitness Awards “Best Fitness App,” and has been featured in the New York Times, Wall Street Journal, the Today Show, and U.S. News & World Report.

SO MUCH MORE THAN A CALORIE TRACKER & FOOD JOURNAL

It’s like having a dietitian, personal trainer, and nutrition coach at your fingertips.

Log Food – Easy-to-use tools make food tracking quick and simple
Record Activity – Add workouts and steps with the fitness tracker
Customize Your Goals – Weight loss, weight gain, weight maintenance, nutrition & fitness
See Your Progress – Track at a glance, or analyze nutrition & calories in detail
Learn From a Registered Dietitian – Meal Plans customized for your target calories, whether you want to lose or gain weight—with access to our Meal Planner tool
Stay Inspired – 500+ healthy goal-focused recipes and 50 workouts keep routines fresh and fun
Connect With Community – Find friends and motivation in our active forums

A CLOSER LOOK AT FEATURES & BENEFITS

Gain Valuable Insights Through Food Logging

Discover which foods fuel you best. It’s not just a diet app, calorie counter to lose weight, or a faster way to fat loss—it’s about holding yourself accountable and understanding what you put in your body.

One of the Largest Food Databases – Track calories in over 14 million foods (including restaurant dishes)
Fast & Easy Food Tracker Tools – Type to search, add foods from your history, or quick-add calories
Bar Code & Meal Scan: Log store-bought foods and entire meals using your phone’s camera
Calorie Tracker – Automatically count calories and see your daily progress
Macro Tracker – See carbs, fat & protein breakdown by gram or percentage—no need for a separate carb tracker or keto diet app!
Nutrition Tracker and Insights – Analyze nutrition intake and set specific goals for macros, cholesterol, sodium, fiber & more
Water Logging – Easily keep track of your water intake. 

Customize Your App Experience

Choose settings that help you achieve your goals.

Custom Goals – Track calories by meal or day, set up macro goals & more
Personalized Dashboards – Pick stats you want to see at a glance
Net Carbs Mode/Carb Tracker – To simplify a low carb or keto diet, view net (not total) carbs
Protein Counter – Set your protein goals and track how much you eat during the day
Add Your Own Foods/Meal Tracker – Save recipes and meals for quick logging
Connect 50+ Apps & Devices – From fitness tracker and smartwatch apps, including the Health app
Track With Apple Watch – A calorie tracker, water tracker, and macro tracker on your watch face.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS

MyFitnessPal is free to download and use. If you upgrade to MyFitnessPal Premium, we offer monthly & annual auto-renewing subscriptions.

Payment is charged to your credit card through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless you turn off auto-renewal in iTunes Account Settings after purchase, or cancel your subscription at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period.

View our full terms & conditions and privacy policy: https://www.myfitnesspal.com/privacy-and-terms

Build muscle, increase your strength, or get lean with Gravl. Whether you are at home in the gym or outside, Gravls training algorithm will provide you with a personalized workout designed to help you reach your fitness goals.

A new generation of fitness algorithm

Unlike existing fitness apps, Gravls Algorithm doesn't just assemble random workouts. Our technology looks at your unique attributes (gender, weight, age, training level) and studies your workout patterns to evolve around your schedule, goals, equipment, and place of training.

As you train more Gravl gets better. Your training plan will maximize your progress by adjusting intensity, volume, and weight for each session. The outcome is a balanced effective workout every time.

Optimal exercises

Not all exercises are created equal and Gravl knows this. We believe that mastering the most effective exercises is more important than having different exercises every time. We balance optimal movements and variation so that your exercises are diverse and challenging. 

For beginners, or seasoned gym-goers looking for new workouts, we have over 300 trainer-led videos so you can always add new movements with confidence.

Track your progress

Gravls Strength Score makes measuring your strength and progress straightforward. We calculate this based on 8 different subscores and millions of data points across people of your same age gender body weight and fitness experience.

Customization

You can let Gravl lead the way 100% or set up your own custom workout settings. You have the power to change your fitness goal, workout variety level, muscle split, duration, equipment, and more!

Coach Support

Get support from our coaches, whether you need tips to make the most of our app or workout advice, just message us in-app at any time.

Apple Health. 

Easily track your workouts and Calories burned with our Apple Health integration

Why Gravl?

Gravl combines leading fitness research, input from certified personal trainers, and constant feedback from our community to deliver a solution that is effective, affordable, and practical.

* Personalized Health Insights Understand your patterns and receive tailored advice based on your unique heart data and trends.

Why Choose Heart Health Monitor & Tracker? Designed for ease of use and backed by accurate data, this app is ideal for anyone looking to track heart performance, detect potential issues early, and live a heart-healthy life.

Download Heart Health Monitor & Tracker today and take the first step toward better heart health.

ZTFit APP是一款配合智能手环设备的软件，该APP是通过蓝牙和手环建立连接通讯，能检测和评估用户的运动数据、睡眠质量等信息，帮助使用者更好，更方便的了解和调整自身的生活作息状况。

iPulse helps you take full control of your heart health and overall well-being. Easily track your heart rate, blood pressure, blood sugar, blood oxygen, and weight while monitoring your daily activity and water intake. Stay informed, live healthier, and make every day count!

Measure your heart rate quickly using your phone’s camera and follow daily trends with new core indicators. iPulse now provides step-by-step guidance when abnormal heart rate patterns are detected, giving you deeper insights into your cardiovascular health.  

Key Features:
√ Heart Rate Monitoring: Measure your heart rate anytime and track progress using enhanced core metrics.  
√ Blood Oxygen Tracking: Record your blood oxygen levels and monitor trends for better health insights.  
√ Weight Tracking: Log your weight and track changes to manage your health effectively.  
√ Blood Pressure & Blood Sugar Insights: Monitor your readings and view the proportion between blood pressure, blood sugar, and blood oxygen for a complete health overview.  
√ Activity Tracking: Track steps, calories burned, and water intake to get a full picture of your daily habits.  
√ Health Insights: Learn how lifestyle choices impact your heart and overall wellness.  
√ History & Reports: Access detailed historical data to track improvements and spot patterns.  
√ Abnormal Heart Rate Guidance: Step-by-step instructions when unusual heart rate patterns are detected.

Tips for Accurate Measurements:
√ Keep your phone steady while measuring heart rate  
√ Remain calm and breathe steadily  
√ Lightly cover the back camera with your finger—no pressure needed  

iPulse integrates with HealthKit to adjust your heart rate and health metrics based on your personal parameters, making tracking seamless and personalized.

Medical Disclaimer:
iPulse is not designed for medical purposes. It should not be used as a medical diagnosis or treatment tool. Please consult a doctor before making any medical decisions.
